sentences.sContent: Work out how much all these things will cost.
sentences.sContent_eng: Work out how much all these things will cost.
sentences.sCn: 算计算计买这么多东西要多少钱。

sentences.sContent: It is not how much you read but what you read that counts.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is not how much you read but what you read that counts.
sentences.sCn: 问题不在于你读了多少书，而在于你读了哪些有价值的书。
